Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards

Class ObjectObjective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.ObjectiveCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.ObjectObjective
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ObjectObjective extends ObjectiveCard
Class used to model objective cards that award points based on the objects visible on the player's board.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectObjective

      public ObjectObjective(String name, int points, Map<ObjectType,Integer> objectsRequired)
      Constructs a new objective card with the given name, that requires the specified objects in order to give points.
      Parameters:
      name - The card's name.
      points - The points given by this card.
      objectsRequired - Map containing the amounts of each object required for this card to award points.
